overview: Beautiful and stunning Teresa Orlowski is as insatiable as ever, and her new stories burst with passion, lust and desire. Meet the hottest and horniest women you've ever seen and admire their drive and insatiable lust. These babes wanna fuck anywhere and at anytime! Each story is incredibly heated and arousing, so don't miss a single one of them.  The 4th installment of the Foxy Lady series features anal scenes from Lynn Armitage, Michelle Davy and, of course, Teresa. Plus, don't miss an early performance from renowned director Christoph Clark!
title: Foxy Lady 4
